description: This file defines multiple repository interfaces related to content, metadata, assets, and ratings for an Android app, along with their mock implementations. It also includes data classes for content info, instructions images, and app metadata.

classes.name: ContentRepository
classes.description: Interface providing content metadata for rating overlay and content screens.

classes.name: MetadataRepository
classes.description: Interface providing application copy, labels, and configuration metadata.

classes.name: AssetsRepository
classes.description: Interface for accessing local asset paths or URLs for images.

classes.name: RatingRepository
classes.description: Interface for managing user ratings and likes, with persistence for content.

classes.name: IndiceCopy
classes.description: Data class encapsulating text and labels for the index or description screen.

classes.name: InstructionImages
classes.description: Data class describing paths for various instruction images used in the app.

classes.name: ContentInfo
classes.description: Data class representing minimal content metadata for overlays.

classes.name: VodRatingSettings
classes.description: Data class for rating overlay timing and settings.

classes.name: MockContentRepository
classes.description: Mock implementation of ContentRepository, providing static data for testing or offline mode.

classes.name: MockMetadataRepository
classes.description: Mock implementation of MetadataRepository, returning localized strings.

classes.name: MockAssetsRepository
classes.description: Mock implementation of AssetsRepository, returning asset path strings.

classes.name: MockRatingRepository
classes.description: Mock implementation of RatingRepository, managing rating states in-memory.

methods.name: getHomeSections
methods.description: Fetches list of home section titles, simulated with a delay, in MockContentRepository.

methods.name: getContentInfo
methods.description: Returns static content info object for a given ID, used in mock responses.

methods.name: getIndiceCopy
methods.description: Returns localized copy for the index/description screen.

methods.name: getVodRatingSettings
methods.description: Provides default timing settings for VID ratings.

methods.name: getInstructionImages
methods.description: Returns paths to instruction images stored in assets.

methods.name: hasRated
methods.description: Checks if user has rated specific content ID.

methods.name: setRated
methods.description: Stores user's rated state for a content ID.

methods.name: isLiked
methods.description: Checks if user has liked a specific content ID.

methods.name: setLike
methods.description: Stores user's like state for a content ID.
